capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and it's a mantra that I live by as a professor.

I'm Valeria, and I have to say that Flitwick is an incredible individual. He's truly a master of his craft as a professor and a wizard in general. His mantra of "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live" really resonates with me, especially when it comes to balancing academic pursuits with the demands of being a witch.
